Title: Implicit Returns
Content:
Some functions that return values do so explicitly. For example, the [`logic`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L62) and [`logicStatic`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L72) functions both explicitly return their return values.


However, other functions do not return their return values explicitly. For example, the [`build(address _owner)`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L126) and [`record`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L137) functions do not use explicit return statements.


Consider using explicit returns instead of implicit returns on all functions with a return value. This helps prevent regressions that may occur when code changes over time.
